text:
Turimatic | Embedded Systems Developer | Remote / USA

→ We are a small hardware startup developing engineering calculators. We are looking for an embedded systems developer with mathematics background. We are obsessive in everything we do - from clarity of code to manufacturing.

→ You will have a direct impact through education and inspiring students, promoting STEM careers and ultimately helping scientists, researchers and engineers in their day to day lives.

→ If you're interested, please reach as input@turimatic.com
